org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class ForShowTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.TrianaTool
              • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.ForShowTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, TrianaColorConstants, ForShowComponent, NodeListener, TaskListener

    public class ForShowTool
extends TrianaTool
implements NodeListener, TaskListener, ForShowComponent
    ForShowTool is a class for showing what tools within group are connected to in upper groups. They provide an icon which is smaller that normal units and just indicates the connection

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
